job.title: Enterprise Software Engineer

and production systems This role will be focused on building new software solutions to provide advanced technology systems across the enterprise You will have the opportunity to creatively design JavaltligtltligtLeverage web based languages and frameworks such as TypeScript React and Vuejs to create reports dashboards and webbased applicationsltligtltligtCollaborate with internal teams and customers to identify new products and services requirements features and interfacesltligtltligtBe a key contributor to the teams code baseltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat Youll Need To incorporate CICDltligtltligtExperience in using infrastructure as codeltligtltligtHigh level of comfort in Linux and OSX platforms and development toolsltligtltligtFamiliarity working in an end to end and snacksltligtltligtPretax commuter benefitsltligtltligtMonthly wellness stipend ltligtltligtProfessional development reimbursementltligtltligtEmployee assistance programltligtltligtDiscounted programs that include legal services identity theft protection pet insurance and moreltligtltligtCompany and team bonding outlets employee resource groups quarterly team activity stipend and wellness initiativesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtOur BackgroundltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtArgo AI was founded in late 2016 by industry experts with extensive experience building robotic systems for commercial applications Our oncesmall team has since grown into an over 1000person strong company with strategic partnerships with two of the worlds leading automakers Ford and Volkswagen Our selfdriving system is the first with commercial deployment plans for Europe and the US and thanks to an ability to tap into both automakers global reach our technology platform has the largest geographic deployment potential of any selfdriving technology to dateltbrgtltbrgtAt Argo AI we believe that embracing differences delivers superior results We are an equal opportunity employer that is committed to an inclusive environment for all employees
